projects.title: Photo Gallery Website
projects.description: This website was created as an example of a photo gallery with features such as filtering,counter and showing a modal. The project was created using React

projects.title: Restaurant Menu Website
projects.description: One of the first website I coded. This website was created as an example of a restaurant menu website. The project was created using HTML, CSS and JavaScript.It includes features like: saving new items and displaying them in a different page
